price: 99. Had these (idols) been âlihah (gods), they would not have entered there (Hell), and all of them will abide therein.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةٗ مَّا وَرَدُوهَاۖ وَكُلّٞ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: law kāna hāulāi ālihatan mā waradūhā wakullun fīhā khālidūna
